name: HeroShip - AdventureIdleRPG
description:
Let's go on a new adventure in the sea!
Discover the treasure dungeon!

▶ Start your adventure!
Various monsters and islands are awating you on the every new sea you will face.
Adorable talks of heroes are a bonus in the game.



▶ Create your own hero party!
There are so many heroes in Hero Ship!
Which would be the strongest hero? a healer, a dealer, or a tanker?
Find out the best hero combinations!



▶ Three attribute towers with various kinds of monsters
You can find new dungeons throughout the adventure.
Show your power within the three attribute towers awaiting



▶ Merge your heroes!
The tier of each hero can be upgraded by merging heroes.
A hero of high tier... is just awesome!



▶ Offline battle rewards!!
Your heroes never stop to go on the adventure even if the game is off!
Collect massive bonus from hero's blood and sweat




- Upcoming updates plan


▶ A new contents for hero growth!
New equipment? tresures? Which content would be on the next update?



▶New dungeons!
Never experienced new special mode is coming in the way!

Please look forward to the new content that will be updated!



- A guide
▶You can obtain a plenty of gems throughout the game for free.
▶There are no additional downloads requried after the install




- Customer service
If you have any questions or ideas that would be a help for developing the game, please send your thoughts to heroship@playhardlab.com
HeroShip will always hear from you to be better
